attrib:
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 100 / 100 / 100 / 100
RADIUS: 350 / 350 / 350 / 350
RANGE: 1550
MAX CHANNEL TIME: 2 / 3 / 4 / 5
cmb:
MANA COST: 150/160/170/180
COOLDOWN: 10
desc: Channels a ball of light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, the ball deals damage and gives vision in a line.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage dealt.
notes:
Gives increasing vision over the channeling time.
Damages mechanical units.
lore: Ezalor's hidden light reveals itself in marvelous fashion.
name: keeper_of_the_light_illuminate

attrib:
LEAK DURATION: 5 / 6 / 7 / 8
MANA LEAK PERCENT: 5%
STUN DURATION: 1.5 / 2 / 2.5 / 3
cmb:
MANA COST: 75/75/75/75
COOLDOWN: 16
desc: Weakens an enemy's magical essence, causing them to lose mana as they move.  If the enemy loses all of its mana, it will be stunned.
notes: If the target travels over 300 distance in less than 0.1 second (by using blink skills, for example), Mana Leak will not decrease its mana for that distance.
lore: Ezalor disrupts Primordial harmony, draining magical energy from those with poor constitution.
name: keeper_of_the_light_mana_leak

cmb:
MANA COST: 25/35/45/55
COOLDOWN: 19/18/17/16
desc: Restores mana to the target unit.
lore: In the same vein, Ezalor bestows his harmony among others.
name: keeper_of_the_light_chakra_magic

affects:
ABILITY: No Target, Channeled, Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Allies
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/100/100
COOLDOWN: 15
desc: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.
notes:
If Keeper of the Light dies, the spell effect is interrupted.
Recall will interrupt channeling spells.
You can disable help to prevent Keeper from casting this spell on you.
Can be cast through the minimap, choosing the nearest friendly hero.
name: keeper_of_the_light_recall

attrib:
RADIUS: 675 / 675 / 675
DURATION: 4 / 5 / 6
MISS CHANCE: 80% / 80% / 80%
KNOCKBACK DISTANCE: 250 / 250 / 250
cmb:
MANA COST: 50/50/50
COOLDOWN: 20/16/12
desc: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.
notes:
Causes knockback of 400 range over 0.4 seconds, centered on the middle of the target area.
Does not interrupt channeling.
lore: The Primordial light turns the tides of battle in favor of Ezalor and his allies.
name: keeper_of_the_light_blinding_light

cmb:
MANA COST: 100/100/100
COOLDOWN: 80/70/60
desc: Ezalor turns his body luminescent temporarily, gaining various abilities.  Illuminate is now channeled by a separate spirit, and gains the Blinding Light and Recall abilities.  Aghanim's Scepter provides permanent Spirit Form, during the day gives unobstructed vision, Illuminate heals allies for 75% of the damage values.
lore: In a flash of light, Ezalor reveals his true nature.
name: keeper_of_the_light_spirit_form
